title: Major Overhaul: Ostrova International airport LKMT) upgrade unveiled!
description:
Ostrova International Airport, previously known as Ostrava-MoÅ¡nov International Airport, has received a recent update in MSFS. This airport serves the city of Ostrava in the Czech Republic, an important hub for economic and industrial activities. Situated 20 kilometers southwest of Ostrava, it also serves as an entry point to northern Moravia and Czech Silesia. The latest update has introduced numerous additional details, enhancing the realism of using this airport in MSFS.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
